genesisQuest.title: Discover Your Impact Profile

lena.title: Verified Impact Partner
lena.description: Driven by sustainability and long-term preservation. You believe in the power of nature.

markus.description: Focused on systems, innovation, and calculated growth. You build the future with precision.

david.title: Digital Participative Partner

genesisQuest.modal_text_title: Complete your Genesis Quest to receive Bonus Points.
genesisQuest.modal_text_desc: These Bonus Points can be used to redeem products within the platform.
genesisQuest.save_profile_hint: Save your profile and claim your Bonus Points.

questions.question: The future of our climate is currently unstable. What is the first pillar you want to build to change this?

options.dropdown: A radical acceleration of forest recovery to secure a stable future for the next generations.
A solid, member-led foundation that ensures every cent is managed with professional transparency.
A dynamic ecosystem where everyone's participation multiplies to achieve a shared environmental victory.

questions.question: A true shaper of the future doesn't just watch from the sidelines. What is your primary role in this mission?

options.dropdown: By knowing exactly which square meters are being reforested and seeing biodiversity return.
By verifying the legal and ethical standards of a cooperative that belongs to me and my fellow members.
By using digital tools to connect with others and lead collective efforts that amplify our positive environmental impact.

questions.question: When you look back on your time with us in one year, which result would make you feel most proud?

options.dropdown: That I recovered real square meters of rainforest, bringing life and biodiversity back to critical areas of the Amazon.
That I helped build a professional cooperative that provides the necessary resources to the indigenous guardians, acting as their legal and financial shield.
That I am part of a modern community where digital participation connects us directly to the ground, turning our shared mission into a rewarding success.

quest.title: Quests
quest.subtitle: Complete quests to earn bonus points and unlock new levels.

home.subtitle: Weâ€™re turning Amazon stewardship from a side-project into a professional mission. Join the first German Cooperative (eG) built to make impact measurable, transparent, and yours.

m2_section.label: Real Impact Metrics
m2_section.caption: Protected Forever
m2_section.title: Why we measure in mÂ², not just trees.
m2_section.body: Planting a tree is a start, but a whole ecosystem is the mission. A single tree is a data point, but a square meter of the Amazon is a home for biodiversity, a carbon sink, and a legacy. We don't just count saplingsâ€”we secure the land they grow on.

home.ecosystem_title: An integrated platform for professional impact.
home.feature_invest_desc: Your contributions convert directly into mÂ² of secured habitat, protecting vital ecosystems from the ground up.
home.feature_earn_desc: Receive 'Bonus Points' for your active participationâ€”a digital recognition of your engagement and contribution to the movement.
home.feature_join_desc: Become a co-owner of the mission. Participate in democratic decisions and connect with a community of visionary founders.

genesis_section.hook: Complete the Genesis Quest to see where your perspective meets our professional framework.

startnext_section.title: Become a Founding Member.
startnext_section.body: We are currently in our 'Genesis Phase.' To ensure total independence and legal security under German Cooperative Law, we are raising our initial foundation capital on Startnext.
startnext_section.offer: By supporting us now, you secure your status as a 'Genesis Founder,' receive the digital Land Dollar prototype, and help us build the infrastructure that makes professional reforestation possible.

widget.title: Reforestal eG
widget.quote: We make protecting the Amazon our top priority.

cta_final_points.title: The German eG:
cta_final_points.text: You aren't a customer; you are a co-owner with democratic participation.

cta_final_points.title: Strict Oversight:
cta_final_points.text: Regulated by German auditing associations to ensure every cent goes toward the mission.

cta_final_points.title: Full Transparency:
cta_final_points.text: Access real-time data and track your managed mÂ² through your personal Dashboard.
